member.summary: Sets on or off the Power LED.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.M5Stack.M5Core2.InitializeScreen(System.Int32)
member.remarks: The screen initialization takes a little bit of time, if you need the screen consider using it as early as possible in your code.

member.name: T:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console
member.summary: Console class to display text on screens

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.Font
member.summary: The font to use in the screen

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.ForegroundColor
member.summary: The foreground color. Default is White.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The background color. Default is Black.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.WindowHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of the screen in rows

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.WindowWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of the screen in columns. Note this is based on the max character size. If you are using a non fix font, you will most likely be able to writ"e more characters.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.CursorLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets the column position.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.CursorTop
member.summary: Gets or sets the row position.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.ResetColor
member.summary: Resets the colors to their default, White for the foreground and Black for the background.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a text on the screen at the cursor position. Cursor position will automatically increase.
member.remarks: No new line character will be recognized, use WriteLine instead.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Console.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a text on the screen at the cursor position and goes to the next line.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Screen.Enabled
member.value: to enable the screen, to disable it.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.Screen.BrightnessPercentage
member.summary: Gets or sets the screen brightness.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.ScreenBase.MaxBitmapSize
member.summary: Maximum buffer size for a Bitmap on the native side.

member.name: P:nanoFramework.M5Stack.ScreenBase.LuminosityPercentage
member.summary: Sets the screen intensity in percentage from 0 to 100.
member.remarks: If this is not natively supported, the threshold of 50 will make the screen either on or off.

member.summary: Write a text on the screen
member.param: The width of the area to display.
The height of the area to display

member.summary: Writes on the screen some text.

The height of the area to display.
